main event: A civilian reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object in Austin, Texas on June 24, 1967, observing it for approximately 9 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a rapid angular velocity and hovered for about 75 seconds after the witness flashed a spotlight at it., The witness experienced a feeling of being watched during the sighting., The object was described as cigar-shaped and moving with a lifting attitude., The sighting occurred in clear weather conditions with scattered clouds., The individual reporting the sighting had a background in scientific studies, which may lend credibility to their report.
witness description: Paul E. Kau, a 25-year-old Art History student at the University of Texas.
